item.description:
***We are looking for a new place to play and will changes the venue for the 18th if we can find one.***

Play Cribbage!

Come out, meet new people, have dinner and play some cards. We have been playing every other Tuesday since the spring and would like to have some new players join us.

We meet at 6:00 and play until 8 or 9. Dinner is optional and you may arrive late.

**** NEW LOCATION****
Joe Sent Me

http://www.joe-sent-m...

On Main St across from Hannefords supermarket.
item.name: Cribbage, Tuesday Dec 18, 2007
